QuestData.Title: Nobody to Blame but Myself
QuestData.Description: This is my fault. I... I ignored his warnings, his complaints, everything. I couldn't help myself - I saw those Scourge just beyond the tower, and I... I HAD to go kill them.$b$bArgus says that Gidwin was taken northwest, and that's our only lead, so that's where we'll head.$b$bNorthdale and the Argent Crusade be damned! We're getting Gidwin back from those Scourge trash.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hop in Fiona's Caravan and ride to Northpass Tower.
QuestData.CompletionText: We have no time, $n! We must press on!
QuestData.RewardText: Time is wasting, $n. Every minute we waste gives the Scourge another chance to kill Gidwin. If he isn't dead already.$b$bNot that I think he is. Giddy may be a stick-in-the-mud, but when it comes down to it, he can swing the Light like a champion.

Objectives.Objective: Ride Fiona's Caravan to Northpass Tower
